General.Name: Sato office and Houseware supplies S.A.
General.Description: Sato office and Houseware supplies S.A. provides office and home furniture products in Greece. The company offers seating for offices, auditoriums, airports, and conference spaces; office and management desks; and room dividers under the SATO brand. It also provides home furniture under the entos brand; and sofas, bookcases, functional office desks, and ergonomic work or managerial seats under the SATO Stock brand. The company sells its products through a network of stores. Sato office and Houseware supplies S.A. was founded in 1964 and is based in Heraklion, Greece.
